pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Wednesday, October 21, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

10:00 a.m.  The Prime Minister will virtually attend the National Caucus meeting.

2:00 p.m.  The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

6:30 p.m.  The Prime Minister will participate in a virtual town hall Q&A with Memorial University students, staff, and faculty members.

                  The town hall will be livestreamed on YouTube, with a link available at https://www.mun.ca/ prior to the start of the event.

Media appearance

7:50 a.m.  An interview with the Prime Minister will air live on ICI Radio-Canada Première Nouveau-Brunswick.
